CustomField.description: If the initial amount should be a different amount than the 'Each Amount' field. For ex., charging a $1,000 setup fee and each subsequent (each) payment is $500. Leave blank if all payment amounts are the same (just use Each Amount or Total Amount).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the initial amount should be a different amount than the 'Each Amount' field. For ex., charging a $1,000 setup fee and each subsequent (each) payment is $500. Leave blank if all payment amounts are the same (just use Each Amount or Total Amount).
CustomField.label: Initial Amount
